io.micronaut.serde.bson.custom

Class AbstractBsonSerde<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.serde.bson.custom.AbstractBsonSerde<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deserializer<T>, Serde<T>, Serializer<T>, NullableDeserializer<T>, NullableSerde<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BsonRepresentationSerde, CodecBsonDecoder

    public abstract class AbstractBsonSerde<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements NullableSerde<T>
    Abstract serializer/deserializer that needs to access Bson decoder/encoder.
